data.text: @karen_surman Everyone is different. My wife and I had it and would not even known we had it. Nothing. No side effects. I have a friend who is the fittest/healthiest guy in his age I know. Out for 4-5 days and could not move.
@karen_surman @Fan960Wills Day 4 and I was back to normal.
@Fan960Wills I went from feeling 80% around noon to 60% around 6pm. Hoping for 100% after another night sleep!
@karen_surman Same for me. Day 3 was a lot better.
@karen_surman Sorry to hear that ! But it has happened to many (I was lucky) glad you are on the mend and hope you're back soon :)
@karen_surman it is tough,but at least its doing what it should.I felt the same.Take Care
@karen_surman Moderna also gave me funky vivid dreams.
@karen_surman Holy crap is it real, I feel like I got hit by a truck!
@karen_surman Sorry to hear you got sick but glad you’re feeling better. Pfizer shot for me. No issues. 💉
@karen_surman The moderna was rough too
@karen_surman I had 12 bad hours, but very much worth it!
@karen_surman I was in the same boat. Chills like I had never experienced in my life last night and the general feeling of being hit by a truck today!
@karen_surman Sorry to hear that but well worth it. Definitely different for all. I had no issues at all while my sis and bro both had two days of severe effects. 🤷🏽‍♂️
@karen_surman I figured that was the case when you were MIA from the show!  Glad you are feeling better!
@karen_surman Yup. It’s brutal.  Was I the same boat.    When I got my shot
@karen_surman I’m getting mine in a couple hours!

@karen_surman Me too. I got 5 out of the 6 listed symptoms and it's been a rough 2 days. Everything from headache, fever, chills, muscle soreness and nausea. Feeling better now but my arm is now a bit sore. Better this than actually getting Covid 👍
@karen_surman Glad you are feeling better. I had the AZ with no ill effects. I'm thankful for that and thankful for the Vaccine!! And thankful I can enjoy you on the radio!

@karen_surman I feel you, Karen. I got slammed for two days after getting #AstraZeneca. The full gauntlet of chills, fever, body aches, and extreme exhaustion. But fully back to normal now and feeling great to be vaccinated. 💉👍🏼😁
@karen_surman I have a bit of one setting in (famous last words😬🙄)....

@karen_surman yups.. had a rough 19+ hours. I think the side effects are sporadic now.. but 19 hours of chills, exhaustion, lack of appetite and general malaise was what i had. Shot 2, going to take the day off
@karen_surman Got mine two days ago Had a rough 10 hours yesterday. 💯 today ! 👍🏻
